title: Is it possible to switch Santa's?

replies.body:
If you're asking if it's possible to switch between the "Naughty" and "Nice" missions lines, no. It actually tells you that you wont be able to switch between them.

It sucks, because I want the Baron Poro icon, but the Braumbeard emote, so I'm going to have to give one of them up... Poor planning from Rito, there.
